title: The Power Hour
subtitle: Executive Consultation & Career Coaching
description: A focused 60-minute session with Viswanath Chirravuri covering strategic career guidance in cybersecurity, AI/ML security roadmaps, certification paths (SANS/GIAC, CISSP, CompTIA, Public Cloud), or executive-level threat landscape briefings. Ideal for professionals pivoting into AppSec or leaders needing clarity on Agentic AI risks.
highlights: Personalized career roadmap in AI/ML Security or AppSec
Certification guidance (SANS/GIAC, CISSP, CompTIA, Public Cloud)
Executive threat briefing on Agentic AI risks
Resume & interview coaching for AppSec roles
Actionable next steps delivered within 24 hours

title: The Deep Dive
subtitle: Agentic AI & LLM Security Workshop
description: An intensive half-day workshop on 'Agentic AI for AppSec & Conversational SAST.' Learn to build and attack AI-powered security pipelines, implement conversational static analysis, and defend against prompt injection, tool-use abuse, and model manipulation in production agentic systems.
highlights: Build an Agentic AI security pipeline from scratch
Conversational SAST: AI-driven code review workflows
Attack & defend: prompt injection, tool-use exploits
Hands-on labs with real-world vulnerable AI agents
Certificate of completion & lab environment access (30 days)

title: DevSecOps & AppSec Workshop
subtitle: Secure SDLC & Pipeline Security
description: A hands-on half-day workshop covering DevSecOps pipeline design, automated security testing (SAST, DAST, SCA), secure CI/CD configuration, and embedding security gates into the software development lifecycle. Includes real-world pipeline exercises using industry-standard tools.
highlights: Design a full DevSecOps pipeline from scratch
Hands-on SAST, DAST & SCA tool integration
Secure CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab security gates
OWASP Top 10 vulnerability detection & remediation
Certificate of completion & pipeline templates

title: Product Security Strategy
subtitle: Security Architecture & Supply Chain
description: A focused 2-hour session on building a product security program from the ground up. Covers threat modeling, secure architecture review, software supply chain risk management, SBOM strategies, and establishing security governance across product teams.
highlights: Product security program design & maturity assessment
Threat modeling frameworks (STRIDE, PASTA, Attack Trees)
Software supply chain risk & SBOM strategy
Secure architecture review methodology
Actionable roadmap delivered within 24 hours

title: SAST Tools Deep Dive
subtitle: Static Application Security Testing Setup & Implementation
description: Hands-on setup, configuration, and implementation walkthrough of open-source SAST tools including Semgrep, SonarQube, CodeQL, Bandit, and SpotBugs. Learn to integrate static analysis into your CI/CD pipeline, configure custom rules, triage findings, and reduce false positives. Focused on practical deployment in real-world environments.
highlights: Tool selection guidance: Semgrep, SonarQube, CodeQL, Bandit, SpotBugs
Language-specific SAST: Bandit (Python), Brakeman (Ruby), ESLint Security
CI/CD pipeline integration (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab)
Custom rule creation & policy configuration
False positive reduction & vulnerability triage strategies

title: SCA Tools Deep Dive
subtitle: Software Composition Analysis & Dependency Management
description: Master open-source SCA tools like OWASP Dependency-Check, Grype, Trivy, and OSV Scanner. Learn to identify vulnerable dependencies, automate dependency updates, manage license compliance, and integrate SCA scans into your DevSecOps pipeline. Includes SBOM generation and vulnerability remediation workflows.
highlights: SCA tool comparison: OWASP Dependency-Check, Grype, Trivy, OSV Scanner
Language-specific SCA: Safety (Python), Retire.js, Bundler-Audit (Ruby)
CI/CD integration for automated dependency scanning
SBOM generation (CycloneDX, SPDX) and consumption
Vulnerability remediation workflows & license compliance

title: DAST Tools Deep Dive
subtitle: Dynamic Application Security Testing & Runtime Analysis
description: Hands-on training with open-source DAST tools including OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite Community, Nikto, and Wapiti. Learn to configure authenticated scans, identify runtime vulnerabilities, integrate DAST into CI/CD, and validate fixes with dynamic testing. Covers API security testing and modern web application scanning techniques.
highlights: DAST tool setup: OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite Community, Nikto, Wapiti
Web vulnerability scanners: w3af, Arachni, HTTPX for reconnaissance
Authenticated scanning configuration & session management
API security testing (REST, GraphQL, gRPC) with ZAP & custom scripts
CI/CD integration for automated DAST scans & regression testing

title: SBOM & Supply Chain Security
subtitle: Software Bill of Materials & Provenance Management
description: Comprehensive walkthrough of SBOM generation, management, and supply chain security tooling. Learn Syft, Grype, Cosign, SLSA provenance, and in-toto attestations. Covers VEX (Vulnerability Exploitability eXchange), dependency track, and integrating SBOM workflows into CI/CD for compliance and risk management.
highlights: SBOM generation with Syft, CycloneDX, SPDX formats
Vulnerability scanning with Grype and SBOM consumption
Supply chain provenance: Cosign, SLSA, in-toto attestations
VEX (Vulnerability Exploitability eXchange) implementation
Dependency-Track setup for continuous SBOM monitoring

title: DevSecOps Tooling & Pipeline Security
subtitle: CI/CD Security, IaC Scanning & Container Security
description: Master DevSecOps tools including Trivy, Hadolint, Checkov, TFSec, and Kics for container security and Infrastructure as Code scanning. Learn to secure CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab), implement security gates, and automate compliance checks. Covers Docker security scanning and policy enforcement.
highlights: Container security: Trivy, Grype, Docker Bench for Security
IaC scanning: Checkov, TFSec, Kics for Terraform/CloudFormation/ARM
CI/CD pipeline security: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab hardening
Docker image scanning & vulnerability management workflows
Security gate implementation & policy-as-code with OPA

title: OWASP Security Tools Masterclass
subtitle: OWASP Top 10 Tools Implementation & Best Practices
description: Comprehensive walkthrough of OWASP flagship tools including ZAP, Dependency-Check, ASVS, SAMM, and Threat Dragon. Learn to implement OWASP best practices, conduct security assessments, and integrate OWASP tools into your security program. Covers OWASP Top 10 detection and remediation workflows.
highlights: OWASP ZAP: Automated scanning & manual penetration testing
OWASP Dependency-Check: SCA integration & reporting
OWASP ASVS: Application Security Verification Standard implementation
OWASP SAMM: Software Assurance Maturity Model assessment
OWASP Threat Dragon: Threat modeling and attack surface analysis

title: Enterprise AppSec Bootcamp
subtitle: Corporate DevSecOps & Product Security
description: A comprehensive multi-day corporate program covering DevSecOps transformation, application security program building, product security governance, and software supply chain defense. Tailored for engineering and security teams modernizing their secure development practices.
highlights: DevSecOps maturity assessment & transformation roadmap
Application security program design (SAST, DAST, SCA)
Product security governance & release management
Software supply chain security & SBOM implementation
Custom curriculum aligned to your tech stack

title: Applied AI: RAG, Fine-tuning & MLSecOps
subtitle: Practical AI/ML Implementation & Security Operations
description: Hands-on training in building production-ready AI systems covering RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) architecture, LLM fine-tuning with LoRA/QLoRA, and MLSecOps pipeline design. Learn to implement secure RAG systems, fine-tune models locally, and establish ML model lifecycle security. Covers LangChain, HuggingFace, Ollama, and open-source ML tooling.
highlights: RAG architecture: vector databases (ChromaDB, Weaviate), embeddings, retrieval
LLM fine-tuning: LoRA/QLoRA with HuggingFace PEFT and Unsloth
Local model deployment: Ollama and vLLM for production inference
MLSecOps: model versioning, artifact security, training pipeline hardening
Secure RAG implementation: prompt injection defense, data leakage prevention

title: Vibecoding: Secure AI-Assisted Development
subtitle: Agentic Coding with Security by Default
description: Master the emerging practice of 'Vibecoding' â€” AI-assisted development with security built-in from the start. Learn to leverage Claude Code, Cline, Cursor, and Gemini CLI for secure code generation, implement pre-defined security and quality rules, and perform automated agentic SAST and SCA scans. Hands-on training in building secure applications with AI coding assistants while maintaining code quality and security posture.
highlights: Vibecoding tools: Claude Code, Cline, Cursor, Aider, Gemini CLI
Secure coding by default: OWASP-aligned security rules in AI prompts
Agentic SAST & SCA: Automated security audits of AI-generated code
Security & quality rules: Pre-commit hooks, custom linting, policy enforcement
Hands-on labs: Build secure applications using AI assistants with security guardrails

title: AI Security Bootcamp
subtitle: Corporate AI/ML Training Program
description: A multi-day corporate training program covering the Secure-ML Framework and LLM Application Security. Tailored for engineering teams building or integrating AI/ML systems. Covers threat modeling for LLMs, secure RAG architectures, red-teaming AI systems, and building an internal AI security governance framework.
highlights: Secure-ML Framework: end-to-end ML pipeline security
LLM AppSec: OWASP Top 10 for LLMs in practice
Red-teaming AI systems with automated tooling
Secure RAG architecture design & implementation
Custom curriculum aligned to your tech stack
